title: Pyrasound V1
description: The Egyptian-made home theatre system. Support local production and pre-order this 100% Egyptian full surround-sound Dolby Atmos approved home theatre system.

title: Solar Water Purifier
description: A portable solar-powered water purification device designed for remote villages. Help us provide clean water to those in need.

title: NileSmart Irrigation Sensors
description: Low-cost soil moisture and climate sensors with a mobile app to cut farm water usage by up to 30% across the Delta.

description: A durable, modular backpack designed with Sinai guides. Switchable pockets, desert-grade materials, lifetime repair policy.

title: Eco Brick Maker

title: Alex Artisan Chocolate

title: Cairo Bike Share Expansion

title: Nubian Handcrafts Collective
